attributes.title: Minecraft Rap - "The Minecraft Life"
attributes.caption: Our first Minecraft song was probably our most generic. This song is about, you guessed it, a typical life in Minecraft.
attributes.description: Our first Minecraft song was probably our most generic. This song is about, you guessed it, a typical life in Minecraft.

attributes.title: Minecraft Mob Rap Part I
attributes.caption: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the first installment!
attributes.description: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the first installment!

attributes.title: Minecraft Mob Rap Part II
attributes.caption: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the second installment!
attributes.description: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the second installment!

attributes.title: Minecraft Survival Rap
attributes.caption: Survival mode in Minecraft is pretty tough, especially after you've discovered creative mode. We dramatize the shit out of Survival mode in this song.
attributes.description: Survival mode in Minecraft is pretty tough, especially after you've discovered creative mode. We dramatize the shit out of Survival mode in this song.

attributes.title: Minecraft Rap Battle - "Creeper vs Zombie"
attributes.caption: The two most iconic Minecraft mobs go at it in this Rap Battle. Who wins? Zombie or Creeper? Thank you to Brysi for his verses as the Zombie.
attributes.description: The two most iconic Minecraft mobs go at it in this Rap Battle. Who wins? Zombie or Creeper? Thank you to Brysi for his verses as the Zombie.

attributes.title: Minecraft Griefer Rap
attributes.caption: Griefers are the absolute worst and we despise them. So what do we do? We glorify and give them a voice via this song.
attributes.description: Griefers are the absolute worst and we despise them. So what do we do? We glorify and give them a voice via this song.

attributes.title: Minecraft Mob Rap Part III
attributes.caption: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the third installment!
attributes.description: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the third installment!

attributes.title: Minecraft Music Parody - "Came Prepared"
attributes.caption: "Holy Grail" by Justin Timberlake and Jay-Z was a big hit at the time, so we parodied it in Minecraft.
attributes.description: "Holy Grail" by Justin Timberlake and Jay-Z was a big hit at the time, so we parodied it in Minecraft.

attributes.title: Minecraft Mob Rap Part IV
attributes.caption: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the fourth installment!
attributes.description: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the fourth installment!

attributes.title: Minecraft Rap Battle - "Enderman VS Dirtblock"
attributes.caption: We wanted to do a Minecraft rap battle but approached it in a unique way. Thus, we have an Enderman vs Dirtblock Rap Battle! Thank you to Dan Bull for his verses as the Dirt Block.
attributes.description: We wanted to do a Minecraft rap battle but approached it in a unique way. Thus, we have an Enderman vs Dirtblock Rap Battle! Thank you to Dan Bull for his verses as the Dirt Block.

attributes.title: Minecraft Villager Rap
attributes.caption: The Minecraft villager is the purest form of a victim. We decided to honor these poor guys with a song. Thank you to Ready Up Live, Defmatch and Mimic Ghost for their verses.
attributes.description: The Minecraft villager is the purest form of a victim. We decided to honor these poor guys with a song. Thank you to Ready Up Live, Defmatch and Mimic Ghost for their verses.

attributes.title: Minecraft Herobrine Rap
attributes.caption: The legend of Herobrine is a spooky one. This song follows the mysterious ghost of Minecraft and his antics.
attributes.description: The legend of Herobrine is a spooky one. This song follows the mysterious ghost of Minecraft and his antics.

attributes.title: Minecraft Rap Battle - "Herobrine vs Griefer"
attributes.caption: Herobrine is omnipotent and scares people. The Griefer is a dick who ruins people's homes. Now they'll face off in a Rap Battle.
attributes.description: Herobrine is omnipotent and scares people. The Griefer is a dick who ruins people's homes. Now they'll face off in a Rap Battle.

attributes.title: Minecraft Mob Rap Part V
attributes.caption: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the fifth installment! The next one will be the last.
attributes.description: One of our most popular series follows all the Mobs from Minecraft. Here is the fifth installment! The next one will be the last.

attributes.title: The Sad Creeper Song (Minecraft)
attributes.caption: Creepers are poorly misunderstood. They just want friends like everyone else.
attributes.description: Creepers are poorly misunderstood. They just want friends like everyone else.

attributes.title: Minecraft Mob Rap Part VI
attributes.caption: This is it. The very last Minecraft Mob Rap. (Also, the last Minecraft thing we'll ever do.)
attributes.description: This is it. The very last Minecraft Mob Rap. (Also, the last Minecraft thing we'll ever do.)
